Support the Board of Directors in planning and operating all resources of the business including Goods - Finance - Human Resources - Communication and connecting departments to operate effectively through designed processes. according to international standards.

HomePage.NewsAboutBATTECHTitle: BATTECH develops digital transformation solutions for businesses
HomePage.NewsAboutBATTECHDescription: BATTECH Technology Group has just launched BATTECH PLATFORM business management software - a technology platform that unifies all management operations such as accounting, sales, human resources... on one platform, public application. Advanced technologies such as AI, Blockchain, flexible connection of services help improve work productivity, reduce costs and increase profits.

FooterPage.footerDescription: At BATTECH, we always strive to help businesses reshape corporate governance to operate better, improve business efficiency and improve lives through connecting people and modern technology.

banner.descriptionBannerNews: Provide updated information, new company events to customers and partners
banner.descriptionBannerJobOpportunity: BATTECH believes in the potential and greatness of each person. We value learning, cooperation and mutual support. Discover yourseft. Let us know what you've got and we'll contact you if a role seems like a good fit.
banner.descriptionBannerContact: We bring you a complete IT solution in an increasingly competitive HR environment

IntroductionPage.aboutBATTECHDetail1: BATTECH was established in early 2009, in the context of our country's economy facing many difficulties and challenges. With the desire for success and strong will of young leaders, BATTECH determined to take real estate investment, M&E construction, fire protection as the core in the first phase.
IntroductionPage.aboutBATTECHDetail2: After more than a decade of construction and growth, BATTECH has grown to become a multi-field enterprise with rapid growth..
IntroductionPage.aboutBATTECHDetail3: With the number of 10 employees since its establishment, it has increased to more than 300 official employees and nearly 400 seasonal employees in domestic and foreign projects. Step by step affirming its stature in the market with a series of large works and projects in Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia, China, and many customers and equipment suppliers from Japan, Taiwan, France, Germany, Italy
IntroductionPage.VisionAndMissionDescriptions2: Based on developed technology, everyone's use needs. BATTECH wishes to bring a large virtual world network to the market. So that everyone can share, confide and bond in virtual space, overcoming all barriers
IntroductionPage.VisionAndMissionDescriptions4: The target in 2022-2023 the company will grow large with a scale of 159 - 200 employees. In addition to developing virtual meeting room software, also embarked on making 3D games such as golf, fishing, racing... Turning the company into a technology company
IntroductionPage.VisionAndMissionDescriptions5: one of the top development metaverse in Vietnam.
IntroductionPage.CoreValuesDescription1: BATTECH, also known as BATTECH Technology Company, is a company affiliated to BATGROUP born in the core value of the word 'MEMBER'.
IntroductionPage.CoreValuesDescription2: Technology is developing more and more, with the introduction of the metaverse virtual world to help people connect closer together, BATTECH hopes to open up the interactive online space of users with more multi-dimensionality than current technologies. , instead of just viewing digital content, users in Metaverse will be able to immerse themselves in the space of a virtual digital world.
IntroductionPage.StaffDetail: BATTECH's staff is experienced in technology. Each member has different knowledge and technology fields, when developing software, they all come up with ideas and arguments. With the spirit of solidarity, eager to learn along with enthusiasm and responsibility at work. BATTECH team always listens to the feedback of customers to improve the quality of the product to suit the needs of users. BATTECH personnel are always willing to serve, listen and understand.
